title: The Bachelorette's Jackson Garlick strips down to tight budgie smugglers in Sydney
text:
He's one of the frontrunners to win Angie Kent's heart on this season's The Bachelorette.

And Jackson Garlick certainly appeared in high spirits on Saturday, as he showed off his rippling muscles during a visit to the beach in Sydney.

The 25-year-old donned nothing but a pair of tight budgie smugglers for his sweat-inducing sunbathing session, before taking a dip in the ocean for a cool off.

The whole package! The Bachelorette's Jackson Garlick (pictured) left little to the imagination as he slipped into a tiny pair of blue budgie smugglers in Sydney this weekend

The genetically-blessed pie maker looked relaxed as he caught some rays during the weekend outing, seductively running his hands through his hair as he gave a flash of his washboard abs.

He then hoisted his stacked body up onto a rock, where passers-by could get a full view of his sizzling physique as he dried off from his brief swim.

It's no surprise that Jackson looked ripped in the jaw-dropping images - as the sporting hunk is captain of Glebe's Dirty Reds rugby team, and has been playing the sport since childhood.

Dripping with sex appeal! The hunky pie maker looked relaxed as he caught some rays during the weekend outing, seductively running his hands through his hair as he gave a flash of his washboard abs

Rugby hunk! The muscular lad is the captain of Glebe's Dirty Reds rugby team, and has been playing the sport since childhood

Famous father: Jason's dad is the famous Sean Garlick, who enjoyed a successful rugby career in the nineties before launching his pie company

Despite his love of the game, Jackson admits that he's 'built like an accountant', which led him to ditch a full-time career in rugby to work as a sales executive in the family business, Garlo's Pies.

The cheeky lad's dad is the famous Sean Garlick, who enjoyed a successful rugby career in the nineties before launching his pie company.

His ocean-side appearance comes after photographs confirmed he makes Angie's final four this season.

Taking a dip! Jackson flaunted his rippling muscles as he took a cheeky splash in the sea

Feeling himself! Jackson, who is in the final four of the competition, appeared in high spirits as he caught some rays in the ocean

Flashing the flesh! The 25-year-old donned nothing but the tight blue underwear during his sweat-inducing sunbathing session

He's made it! Jackson's winning personality has certainly charmed Angie - as he's confirmed to be in the final four of the contest

On-set photos obtained by Daily Mail Australia showed the top four contestants to be Jackson, Timm Hanly, Carlin Sterritt and intruder Ryan Anderson.

While all the men are front-runners, fans and betting agencies have tipped 30-year-old aspiring actor Carlin as the ultimate winner.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: He's one of the frontrunners to win Angie Kent's heart on this season's The Bachelorette.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
